TEXT: A joyful girl who aims to bring her friend Marshal back to Rhythm Heaven. NL Playing cards in the right order is key to her rhythmic playstyle.
You admire the Heart's rhythm and regretfully put it to an end.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~young~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~rhythm~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
